meanings.definition: A person who supports or advocates for communism.
meanings.sent1: Some communists believe in sharing resources equally among all people.
meanings.sent2: The communists gathered to discuss their plans for a fairer society.
meanings.sent3: The communists decided to have a potluck dinner to practice their idea of sharing.
meanings.sent4: The group of communists worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The image of communists standing in solidarity is powerful.

meanings.definition: Members of a political party or movement that advocates for the establishment of a communist society.
meanings.sent1: The communists campaigned for policies that would benefit the working class.
meanings.sent2: Many communists believe in the redistribution of wealth for a more equal society.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the communists dressed up as famous revolutionaries.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a world run by communists seemed like a distant dream.
meanings.sent5: The communists' vision of a classless society inspired many.
